summary.Title: Blacksmith to fastgrowing company
summary.Presentation: Staermose Industry is a dynamic fastgrowing subcontractor company, working in all kinds of steel plates with lasercut

WorkPlace.Name: SMART Rekruttering
WorkPlace.Description: Rekrutteringsfirma der gør det nemt og intuitivt for kandidater at søge stillinger.
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Rekrutteringsfirma der gør det nemt og intuitivt for kandidater at søge stillinger.

HiringOrg.Name: SMART Rekruttering
HiringOrg.Description: Rekrutteringsfirma der gør det nemt og intuitivt for kandidater at søge stillinger.
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: Rekrutteringsfirma der gør det nemt og intuitivt for kandidater at søge stillinger.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Staermose Industry is a dynamic fastgrowing subcontractor company, working in all kinds of steel plates with lasercutting, bending and welding of all kind of things from small items to large constructions, depending on the customer needs.
We have a modern machine park, such as laser cutters, tube laser cutters, press Brakes, swingarms, rolling machines and a wide range of other special machines.

Right now we are looking for some topmotivated blacksmiths, who can think independently and work in an international team.

Primarily you should work with usual blacksmith tasks, such as welding, alignment of constructed parts, but depending on your skills you can also be a part of other tasks in the production. The tasks has a wide variety of complection, and therefore the job will challenge you daily on your professional skills.

We believe that flexibility is a natural part of everyday life, and it goes both ways. You must have a positive approach to work, the company and your colleagues, as well as you appreciate an informal work environment in a good tone. 

We expect you to have:

  • Understanding of reading drawings
  • Experience with traditional work as Blacksmith
  • Skills for always doing quality work
  • Maybe experience working in stainless steel an aluminium
  • Good skills in english written, speaking and understanding

We can offer you a job in a modern company where all agreements will be effected. We can take our own decisions, and often there is a short way from thinking to acting. We believe that a smile gives better payback, and all your new colleagues are very helpfull, and will look at you as a part of the team. 
We have eminent working conditions, and the salary is negotiated at a fair level
Normal working hours are 37 hours a week, but you will have the oppertunity to work more if you like.

We will help you to find a place for living, and also helping with the paperwork to get a work permit in Denmark. When you are working in Denmark, you will have also have the bennefits of using hospitals, doctors and more for free.

You can apply for this job by sending an email to info@smartrekruttering.dk, with a few words about yourself. You can also attach your resume if you have one.

We are looking forward to hear from you, and to welcome you to our company.
